patthana21.26:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:5.1: Nahetuṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:6.1: Nahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:6.2: Nanahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:6.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
